channel.title: 2 Problems
channel.description:
[u]One:[/u] I followed a tutorial from: http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/tut-508-99-shopping-548372/ And fit it to a Bulby source, such as changing import paths, syntax, etc. However, I get this error: [code].\Bulby\Engine.java:28: cannot find symbol symbol : class ShopHandler location: class Bulby.Engine public static ShopHandler shopHandler = new ShopHandler(); ^ .\Bulby\Engine.java:28: cannot find symbol symbol : class ShopHandler location: class Bulby.Engine public static ShopHandler shopHandler = new ShopHandler(); ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I have named the class "shopHandler.JAVA" in the windows explorer, and put it in Bulby/content along with "Shops.JAVA". I have imported "Bulby.content.*;" and that still doesnt help. How should I fix this error?
[u]Two:[/u] How can I make NPCs change coords in response to a player action such as the end of a dialogue with them?
Tell me if I need to add any files. Thanks in advance.

item.title: 2 Problems
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

You have no ShopHandler class or instanced the class with the wrong name.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Problems
item.dc:creator: @Aphelion5 Aphelion5
item.description:
@Aphelion5 wrote:

Sorry, no it doesnt:

.\Bulby\Engine.java:28: cannot find symbol symbol : class shopHandler location: class Bulby.Engine public static shopHandler shopHandler = new shopHandler(); ^ .\Bulby\Engine.java:28: cannot find symbol symbol : class shopHandler location: class Bulby.Engine public static shopHandler shopHandler = new shopHandler(); ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Problems
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

[quote=“Aphelion5, post:1, topic:325270”]One:
I followed a tutorial from: http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/tut-508-99-shopping-548372/
And fit it to a Bulby source, such as changing import paths, syntax, etc. However, I get this error:

.\Bulby\Engine.java:28: cannot find symbol symbol : class ShopHandler location: class Bulby.Engine public static ShopHandler shopHandler = new ShopHandler(); ^ .\Bulby\Engine.java:28: cannot find symbol symbol : class ShopHandler location: class Bulby.Engine public static ShopHandler shopHandler = new ShopHandler(); ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .
I have named the class “shopHandler.JAVA” in the windows explorer, and put it in Bulby/content along with “Shops.JAVA”. I have imported “Bulby.content.*;” and that still doesnt help.
How should I fix this error?

Two:
How can I make NPCs change coords in response to a player action such as the end of a dialogue with them?

Tell me if I need to add any files.
Thanks in advance.[/quote]
i can answer one of them
try make ShopHandler () to shopHandler ()
then see if it works if it does i rock(change both btw)!

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Problems
item.dc:creator: @Aphelion5 Aphelion5
item.description:
@Aphelion5 wrote:

One:
I followed a tutorial from: http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/tut-508-99-shopping-548372/
And fit it to a Bulby source, such as changing import paths, syntax, etc. However, I get this error:

.\Bulby\Engine.java:28: cannot find symbol symbol : class ShopHandler location: class Bulby.Engine public static ShopHandler shopHandler = new ShopHandler(); ^ .\Bulby\Engine.java:28: cannot find symbol symbol : class ShopHandler location: class Bulby.Engine public static ShopHandler shopHandler = new ShopHandler(); ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .
I have named the class “shopHandler.JAVA” in the windows explorer, and put it in Bulby/content along with “Shops.JAVA”. I have imported “Bulby.content.*;” and that still doesnt help.
How should I fix this error?

Two:
How can I make NPCs change coords in response to a player action such as the end of a dialogue with them?

Tell me if I need to add any files.
Thanks in advance.
